title: A Reward From Big Sis......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Hehehe~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You seem to be in a good mood, Ruby-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s because Ruby aced the last quiz from a few days ago!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Great job!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe. Ruby’s big sis was so pleased. And guess what, this morning Ruby found a comb by her pillow! Ruby’s big sis gave it to her as a reward! Look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s a very beautiful comb. A reward from your sister, huh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Has your big sis ever given you a reward, Shioriko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, she has. But in my case... they’re usually a bit, let’s say, unconventional or eccentric...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>When I was a kid, I finished all my summer homework in July... My sister praised me a lot. And for my reward, she gave me...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What is it!? It must be something exciting...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>A cicada’s shell.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigiii!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>B-but it was a very clean shell without any scratches or cracks! My sister said, “This is the most beautiful one,” and gave it to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>...She gave you the best one. That’s... kinda sweet, actually!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes! My big sister might be a little odd... but I love her a lot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
